typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test1
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test3
test1 derive(geboortedatum = toDate(geboortedatum)) ~> DerivedColumn1
